      How to write like JK Rowling

      Published:  10 June 2018
      Written by: Richard Crimson
      Image credit: https://www.barnesandnoble.com/
      • Writing
      • How to write like JK Rowling

      You just come up with an awesome universe and spend five years world-building.

      Easy!

      Jokes aside, if you want to know how JK Rowling wrote Harry Potter, here’s what you need to know

      • how Rowling used story structure
      • how Rowling used foreshadowing, mystery, pacing and suspense
      • how Rowling created her Harry Potter characters
      • how Rowling uses series as threads for Order of The Phoenix plot
      • what the theme of Harry Potter is all about

      Check out these articles and you’ll be on your way to understand all the tactics JK Rowling used.

      With that being said, happy reading!

      Oh, and don’t forget to check out the Fantastic Five free email course. That will give you a very good head start in learning all of the above.

      But if you want to get serious about it, sign up for the waiting list of the Fiction Coach Masterclass.

      Talk soon.

      P.S: Remember what Rowling said:

      Je. Meurs. O.M.G genre une auteure dont je suis fan depuis petite me répond et m'encourage. Genre je. J'ai pas les mots. pic.twitter.com/p6ywqDqB9e

      — Roi-Sorcier d'Angmar (@_Uruk_Hai_) November 12, 2017
